author: James Joyce
text: Dear Mr and Mrs Hertz: We hope you got home all right in the dark. Here is the come-all-you about the turkey. You may copy it if you wish but please return it as I have no other myself. I have just had tea with your aunt and we got on very well together, I think, as I tried my clearest tenor tones. Greetings to you both sincerely yours James Joyce
